FuncDef:
The isis ppp-osicp-check command enables OSICP check on a PPP interface.
The undo isis ppp-osicp-check command cancels the setting.
By default, IS-IS ignores checking OSICP.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
By default, OSCIP status of PPP does not affect IS-IS interface status.
After the isis ppp-osicp-check command is run, OSI network negotiation status of PPP affects IS-IS interface status. When PPP detects a failure on the OSI network, the link status of the IS-IS interface goes Down, and the route to the network segment where the interface resides is not advertised through LSPs.
For a broadcast interface, set the link type of the interface to P2P before running the isis ppp-osicp-check command.
